overview:
User Experience Consultant, co-founder of di8it - Interactive Development and UX Consultancy and Use8 - The User Experience Society.

Specialised on interactive TV but generally passionate about interactive media and marketing.

I studied Digital TV Management Production, Postgraduate Certificate in Interactive Creativity & Strategy and BA in Advertising and Public Relations.

In terms of relevant experience, I have worked as a project manager in interactive advertising agencies for several years defining, managing and coordinating multimedia projects for clients such as Nike, Universal Studios PortAventura, Danone, Futbol Club Barcelona and the Catalonia Government.
